short_summary: Elder services for Correctional Service of Canada
description: Elder services to provide Indigenous programs and services with traditional elders. Each contracting entity will provide services for 2-3 years, depending on their feasibility and willingness to deliver services. The requested services to provide guidance, teaching, healing ceremonies, and guidance to staff and offenders based on Indigenous cultural practices and protocols. Service providers will provide services in the following locations: Fraser Valley, Victoria, Vancouver. Technical Authority will be responsible for ensuring that each contractor performs services in contracts that meet the minimum number of years and terms noted in the specifications.Each contractor will be responsible for security needs and coordinating travel. A common CIT has been set for this contract in 2023 under a Certified Industry Team (CIT)), and contractors must appoint 4 CIT teams by April 15, 2023.
